name: A game for a study #1
description:
Hello. I am Benas Aukštikalnis from Vytautas Magnus University. This is a study in the marketing field, related to advertising in digital games. 

I do not collect any data other than the answers from the survey which will be provided after playing the game for 4 minutes. 

During the study, you will control a small spaceship in the game while trying to avoid obstacles and collecting items to proceed. After the session ends, you will have to complete a survey.

The game session ends in 4 minutes, after which you will see a pop-up appear with a link to the survey. 

After completing the survey, a thank you message will appear with a confirmation code. 

If you have any further questions, please send me a message on reddit.
